data.message:
These jerkoffs are pretending to be you and are claiming to be giving away millions....

replies.message: I know I've shared same thing spent all damn night too to comment to loads on there its fake etc   can't see my long post tho on here about it :-(
Hopefully he sorts this and gets the page down well his managers X  gosh taken me ages to comment to loads and direct them to correct Eminem page !

They have their page listed "shady" in more ways than one. It sucks balls that they are impersonating him. He does actually give to charities, unlike these fakes who are simply trying to show up in news feeds for self gain.
